section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Neapolis University is a private own higher education institute  with primary target being the creation of a dynamic learning environment focusing on fundamental and applied research in academic areas. Investment in state-of-the-art learning technologies together with the recruiting of faculty members with long experience in teaching and research at international universities provide the guarantee for academic excellence. 
NUP offers undergraduate Programmes in Business Administration, Accounting, Banking & Finance, Law, Psychology, Architecture, Landscape Architecture and Real Estate. The postgraduate programs of the University cover Business Administration, Banking, Investment & Finance, Public Administration, International & European Business Law.  NUP has developed links with the country’s business community and an extensive collaboration network with institutions and organisations worldwide
